message:
AWESOME POST FOR GRAPHIC DESIGNERS: 

This is the guy who is in charge of the new Microsoft identity explaining all the graphic design process till he got to the new logos/branding.
caption: Attachment UnavailableThis attachment may have been removed or the person who shared it may not have permission to share it with you.

data.message:
He is not in charge of anything. It's just a personal project :)
